summary: This is an email chain from April 23, 2021, between U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) and U.S. Marshals Service personnel, forwarding a notification about an attempted visit to Ghislaine Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) by an individual named Enver Ruci on April 22, 2021. The visit was not allowed.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual whom Enver Ruci attempted to visit at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) on April 22, 2021.

persons.name: Enver Ruci
persons.context: An individual who attempted to visit Ghislaine Maxwell at the MDC, claiming it was for a legal visit. He provided a New York State driver's license for identification.

connections.description: Ruci attempted to visit Maxwell in prison, claiming it was for a legal visit, indicating some form of prior connection or intent to establish contact.

events.title: Attempted Prison Visit by Enver Ruci
events.description: An individual named Enver Ruci attempted to visit Ghislaine Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC), filling out a form for an official legal visit. The officer did not allow the visit and stated she had no information on Ruci.

keyFacts: On April 22, 2021, Enver Ruci attempted to visit Ghislaine Maxwell at the MDC, claiming it was for a legal visit.
The visit was not allowed by the officer, who stated she had no information on Ruci.
Ruci's identification came from a New York State driver's license listing an address in Staten Island, New York.
The notification of this attempted visit was forwarded within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) on April 23, 2021.
